EmailTemplate.name: Offer Letter - Domestic
EmailTemplate.subject: Offer of Admission to Monash University - {!Contact.Name} (ID: {!Contact.Person_ID__c})
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
I am pleased to advise that you have been made an offer of admissions to Monash University. Please find attached an electronic copy of your Offer Letter. No hard copies will be posted.
Step 1: Create your Monash Account
Step 2: Register your details Using your Monash Account, register your details in the enrolment system to;
agree to education rules and health cover for overseas students, update your contact information, fill out the enrolment questionnaire. (When you're logged in, click Enrol. You'll need to agree to the Student Acknowledgement statement first.)
Step 3: Attend enrolment day
If you need to defer this offer, you must apply prior to your commencement date.
Recognition of Prior Learning (RPL) may be applicable to you. Please discuss your eligibility for RPL with your supervisory team. You will need to create Monash Account before you can download the application form.
Kind Regards,
{!Case.OwnerFirstName}
